Title: FR-25 - Record List Table Sorting

Expected Results: [Sorted data is displayed in the record list table]

Title: FR-24 - Delete Candidate Record Validation
Description: Test that validates deleting a candidate record removes the record from the system
Test Steps: Navigate to Candidates Tab | Select a candidate record | Click Delete Button
Expected Results: [Candidate record is removed from the system]
